MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH37 postcode area of Pathhead. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7:18am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of adverse weather conditions and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:09am on Wednesday, 20 January 2021
